rooms.purpose: Reception area with Scandinavian design elements, natural light emphasis through large windows, integrating Vastu by orienting entrance eastward.
Seating area for family meals, designed with natural light via skylight and windows to the east as per Vastu.
Functional yet stylish Scandinavian kitchen, designed with energy efficient appliances and ample storage, oriented to south for optimal sunlight.
Household utilities, laundry, and small storage closet.
Private guest quarters with a Scandinavian minimalist aesthetic, ensuring privacy and quiet, designed with north-facing windows for balanced natural light.
Functional guest bathroom emphasizing Scandinavian cleanliness and simplicity.
Two-car garage integrated into the ground floor with direct access to the living area, designed with Scandinavian aesthetic and efficient storage solutions.

openings.description: Large door with a minimalist Scandinavian design, aligned with Vastu principles for welcoming positive energy.
Floor-to-ceiling window maximizing natural light and ventilation, oriented toward east.
Skylight providing ambient lighting and enhancing ventilation, designed in a minimalist style.
South-facing window to maximize sunlight exposure for natural light.
North-facing window ensuring balanced lighting and ventilation as per Vastu.
